title: IPB Connect, Software Engineer
description: IPB Connect is a platform that helps you to find a job and maintain your relationship with alumni, friends or even your juniors. This website is specifically for students of the Bogor Agricultural Institute and can only be accessed via the university's email.

title: Atourin Marketplace, Frontend Engineer
description: Marketplace is a feature for you to enjoy products and services from tourism actors in Indonesia, such as tour packages, local activities, homestays, and local souvenirs.

title: Twibbonize, Frontend Engineer
description: Twibbonize is a simple, personalized, and easy-to-use platform built for people & organizations around the world to create, share or find a campaign.
